0: The outside bar grill needs a makeover
Bathrooms need updating carpets redone but overall a nice resort
We can not wait to update this review with details of our stay next week
The rooms were old and in need of a makeover

we have stayed in many places we have never experienced anything like it while there are new condos rooms going in they are trying to sell time shares might I suggest that putting some of that money into updating the existing hotel might be a good idea
The Na Hoku Lounge was refitted with “ industrial ” looking furniture not the “ Hawaiana ” feel of the rest of the hotel
The comments by others regarding this property needing a facelift are spot on

After a miscomunication on her part as it appears she decided we had locked ourselves out we finally had maintenance come out to our room after half an hour of waiting and let us in using a giant hook under the door as they did not have the electronic device to open the door with them once again surprising
Also evident that much of the hotel is undergoing updating many many rooms not available
1: We booked a regular double room and when we mentioned we were there for our anniversary we were upgraded to an oceanfront top floor deluxe queen in the Moana Hale and it was gorgeously updated and the view was to die for
Rooms are big recently renovated decor and bathrooms
The suite we were upgraded to was recently renovated and was a very large one bedroom suite
Staff are very friendly and the hotel is updated very nicely

Good location snorkeling BlackRock pleasant staff renovated rooms sunset walking distance to Whalers Bad resort is disjointed very long walks and elevator rides to lobby beach housekeeping was spotty bugs not enough shade around pool guests reserving chairs rowdy kids in pool
So glad we moved from the Westin which is where we were going to stay earlier until I got sent an email that they are doing major renovations
Pros it was roomy appeared to have been renovated in the last year
Undergoing renovations so some nice resturants are closed
I mark it up to renovations underway
Great location but needs updating and good cleaning
